idea:
Edulight  is an Audio-Visual Software which helps a student even in the absence of their teacher. Software contains teaching of experts in their field who have encompassed every aspect of their respective subject in great details; all concepts are simplified for better understanding. Animated clips and story board is used to make the learning more effective.
Edulight is an acronym for enlightening your knowledge through bringing E-education (Information communication & technology (ICT) to millions of learners transcending the barriers of geographies, economic levels and languages.
name: Edulight Software
